meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Paraguay.
meanings.sent1: In Paraguay, you can buy many things with guaranis.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for guaranis at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine only accepted guaranis, so I couldn't buy a snack.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a million guaranis.
meanings.sent5: The sound of coins clinking together reminded me of guaranis.

meanings.definition: A member of an indigenous people of Paraguay and parts of Brazil and Argentina.
meanings.sent1: The guaranis have a rich cultural heritage.
meanings.sent2: I met a group of guaranis during my trip to Paraguay.
meanings.sent3: The guaranis told funny stories around the campfire.
meanings.sent4: She danced with the grace of a guaranis warrior.
meanings.sent5: The colorful attire of the guaranis caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The language of the Guarani people.
meanings.sent1: Learning guaranis helped me communicate with the locals.
meanings.sent2: I practiced speaking guaranis with a language tutor.
meanings.sent3: The parrot in the zoo started speaking guaranis!
meanings.sent4: Her words flowed like a river in guaranis.
meanings.sent5: The melody of the song was sung in beautiful guaranis.
